title: Dashboard loads real-time KPI data correctly
description: Verify that the dashboard analytics display accurate and up-to-date KPIs related to process mapping, plan execution, and occurrence handling as aligned with backend data sources.

steps.description: Login to the application and navigate to the Dashboard overview screen
Check that all KPI charts (process mapping, plan execution, occurrence handling) load without errors
Verify that data displayed matches backend API responses for KPI metrics
Confirm real-time updates by triggering a backend data change and verifying dashboard reflects update

title: Complete action management workflow for a health action
description: Validate that users can track all 34 health-related action items including adding, updating status, and commenting with history preservation.

steps.description: Navigate to Action Management System
Select an existing health action item
Update the status of the action item and save changes
Verify the status change is reflected immediately in the UI and persisted after refresh
Add a new comment to the action item's comment history
Confirm the new comment is appended correctly and visible in the comments history
Repeat updating for all 34 health actions to ensure full coverage
Ensure no action items are missing and all can be tracked with comments and status

title: Advanced filtering with multiple combined criteria
description: Ensure that the advanced filtering tool correctly filters health actions and processes based on text search, status, responsible user, sector, and date ranges combined.

steps.description: Navigate to the Advanced Filtering component
Apply a text search filter for keyword 'infection'
Select status filters including 'In Progress' and 'Completed'
Choose a responsible user from dropdown
Select one or more sectors from the sector filter
Set a date range filter for the last 3 months
Verify the filtered results only include entries matching all selected criteria
Confirm that combining filters does not result in errors or empty inconsistent results
Clear filters and verify full unfiltered data set is restored

title: Export filtered reports in PDF and Excel formats
description: Validate export functionality generates PDF and Excel reports that correctly represent the currently applied filters and maintain proper formatting.

steps.description: Apply filters to narrow down data in the dashboard or action list
Click on Export button and choose PDF format
Verify that the downloaded PDF report matches the filtered data exactly and is correctly formatted
Click on Export button and choose Excel format
Verify that the Excel file contains correct rows and columns matching the filter criteria
Open exported reports and confirm readability and no data truncation or corruption

title: AI Assistant contextual conversation and persistent chat history
description: Ensure the AI assistant chat modal supports specialized conversations for ONA and Microsoft 365 topics with persistent chat history across user sessions.

steps.description: Open AI Assistant chat modal from the dashboard
Initiate conversation using ONA compliance related queries
Verify the AI assistant responds contextually and accurately to ONA questions
Switch to Microsoft 365 assistant mode and ask relevant questions
Confirm valid and specific answers from the assistant regarding MS 365 usage
Close the chat modal and log out
Log back in and open AI Assistant chat modal
Verify previous chat history is retained and visible
Check chat history synchronization works across multiple sessions

title: Mobile-first responsive UI with theme toggling and collapsible sidebar
description: Test responsiveness of the UI on multiple screen sizes and verify correct operation of theme toggling and sidebar collapsing features.

steps.description: Access the application on various devices (mobile, tablet, desktop) or simulate screen sizes
Verify the layout adjusts fluidly without broken elements or horizontal scrolling
Toggle the theme between dark and light modes
Verify UI colors and styles update appropriately and remain accessible
Collapse and expand the navigation sidebar
Confirm sidebar animations and content visibility update correctly in both states
Check usability and readability of menus and buttons in all configurations

title: Real-time notification system with toast alerts
description: Ensure that notifications for action updates, new comments, and system alerts appear promptly as toast messages with accurate content.

steps.description: Perform actions that trigger notifications (e.g., update an action status, add a comment)
Verify toast notification appears immediately after the triggering event
Check notification content matches the action (e.g., 'Action status updated', 'New comment added')
Trigger multiple notifications in quick succession
Confirm that all notifications appear distinctly and are not dropped or overlapped
Dismiss toast messages manually and verify they are removed from screen cleanly

title: Routing correctness and error page handling
description: Verify that React Router integration properly displays main pages and gracefully handles invalid routes by showing a 404 error page.

steps.description: Navigate via sidebar links to all main pages (Dashboard, Action Management, Reports, AI Assistant)
Verify each page loads correctly without errors
Manually enter invalid URLs or broken links in the browser
Confirm the application displays the 404 Not Found error page
Test browser Back and Forward buttons to ensure routing behaves as expected

title: UI components conform to design and accessibility standards
description: Validate that all reusable UI components such as buttons, dialogs, charts, inputs, badges, and toast notifications conform visually and functionally to design specifications and support accessibility.

steps.description: Review all UI components rendered in typical user workflows
Verify consistency in colors, typography, spacing, and interactions as per design
Check keyboard navigability and focus management for dialogs and inputs
Confirm components provide appropriate ARIA labels and roles for accessibility
Test UI components with screen readers for proper announcements
Ensure no component causes layout shifts or visual glitches on interaction

title: Process mapping and implantation progress dashboards accuracy
description: Check that the process mapping and implantation status dashboards accurately reflect progress data consistent with planning documents and reports.

steps.description: Access the process mapping and implantation status dashboards
Verify all process nodes and workflow steps are displayed correctly with current statuses
Confirm data shown matches the official planning and progress documentation
Simulate process updates and verify dashboards update accordingly
Check visualizations and charts accurately represent completion percentage and timelines

title: Incidence tracking displaying counts, status, and timelines correctly
description: Validate that the incidence tracking feature shows accurate occurrence counts, resolution status, and timelines within the system.

steps.description: Navigate to incidence tracking dashboard
Verify the number of occurrences displayed matches incident records
Check resolution status is correctly reflected for each incidence
Confirm timeline visualizations match incident report dates and resolution deadlines
Add a new incident or update an existing one
Verify updates are reflected immediately in incidence tracking views

title: Error handling on invalid input in filtering and action management
description: Test that system validates inputs properly and provides meaningful feedback or error states for invalid or malformed data in filters and action updates.

steps.description: Enter invalid date ranges in filter such as start date after end date
Verify application shows a relevant error message and prevents filter execution
Attempt to submit empty or malformed comments in action items
Check validation errors appear and input is not accepted
Input invalid or unsupported file formats for export (if applicable)
Confirm system shows an error and disables export until corrected
